participant_1.background:
I am a young woman who loves to ride my bike and spend time with my pets.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit.
I enjoy playing with my cat Seven of Nine.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
i like to water ski.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good, how are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am currently working on a lesson plan for my students.
Oh that is exciting! What subject do you teach?
I teach music.
That is so cool! I love music! What kind of music do you teach?
I teach a variety of genres, but my favorite is classical music.
Oh that is awesome! I love classical music too! I like to listen to it while I work out.
Me too! It helps me focus.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I play the piano and the violin.
Oh wow! That is so cool! I have always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
You should! It is so much fun.
I will definitely look into it!
You should! It is a great way to relieve stress.
I can imagine! It sounds really relaxing.
It is! I love playing the piano after a long day at work.
I bet that is really nice. I could use something to help me relax after a long day at work.
Well if you ever want to learn how to play the piano, I would be happy to teach you!
I would love that! Thank you!
You are welcome!
I have to go now, but it was nice meeting you!
You too! Have a great day!
